actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to clarify that medically necessary procedures related to atrophic and weakened jaws are covered under such title, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act with respect to the inclusion of surgical and prosthodontic procedures following oral cancer and jaw reconstruction surgery within Medicare coverage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to clarify that medically necessary procedures related to atrophic and weakened jaws are covered under such title, and for other purposes.
